name: Succubus RoomMate
description:
Enter a fascinating and seductive world with "Succubus RoomMate". In this addictive cookie clicker game, you can buy cute power-up imps and immerse yourself in a story inside the protagonist's room. Unlock atmospheric scenes with your very own succubus and enjoy intense dialogues in pure anime style.

Main features:

Cookie Clicker Experience: Start your adventure by frantically clicking to get virtual coins and power-ups in the shape of cute little devils. Accumulate ever-increasing wealth to buy new upgrades that accelerate your progression.

Imps Upgrade: Each player will have an adorable collection of power-up imps at their disposal. Each imp will have unique and special abilities that will help you increase your productivity in the game.

Scene in the Protagonist's Chamber: Explore the intimacy of the protagonist's bedroom as the main setting of the game. Unlock different scenes to unlock different camera angles.


Personal Succubus: Thanks to the purchase of the scenes, you will unlock your personal succubus that will accompany you inside the chamber. Interact with her through engaging dialogues.

Dialogues: Every time you buy a new scene, you will unlock dialogues with your personal succubus. deepen the emotional connection and get involved in emotions.

Unlock achievements: as you progress through the game you will be able to unlock achievements on your steam profile.
